title: On contractions of classical basic superalgebras
abstract: We define a class of orthosymplectic $osp(m;j|2n;\omega)$ and unitary $sl(m;j|n;\epsilon)$ superalgebras which may be obtained from $osp(m|2n)$ and $sl(m|n)$ by contractions and analytic continuations in a similar way as the special linear, orthogonal and the symplectic Cayley-Klein algebras are obtained from the corresponding classical ones. Casimir operators of Cayley-Klein superalgebras are obtained from the corresponding operators of the basic superalgebras. Contractions of $sl(2|1)$ and $osp(3|2)$ are regarded as an examples.
